website_summaries.verdict: A good accent piece for your living room, but not a go-to lounge chair.
pros: Lightweight and easy to move around
Small footprint that's great for tight spaces
cons: Firm, straight-backed design not the best for lounging

customer_reviews.title: In love with this
customer_reviews.text: In love with this! I ordered the black velvet loveseat! Now that I have, I’m thinking on ordering the chair as well! It sets my bedroom off and just compliments it so well! Although it arrived nearly out of the box cause the packaging was so damaged, the merchandise was perfectly fine. Only assemble is to attach the legs..
customer_reviews.author: Shavelle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Just what i wanted !
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable easy to put together and classy the perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lashun Lee

customer_reviews.title: the loveseat looks good but the legs are screw in and not the ...
customer_reviews.text: the loveseat looks good but the legs are screw in and not the best quality. when I sit it is unstable (moves back and forth because the legs are not sturdy enough for stability. great probably for kids or adults under 100 lbs, but as an adult male weighing in at 225, not very sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Aqua Color
customer_reviews.text: Much more of an aqua blue than I thought it would be. Looks far lighter in the product photos. I was expecting a light, soft blue but I'm very happy that it's a rich aqua instead. Lovely material...easy to assemble. Hopefully it has a long and happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Muse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I was looking for a small piece of ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I was looking for a small piece of furniture to balance out my white sofa and add a pop of color. I was a little hesitant to order because I wasn't sure this would be a good color, but it's wonderful! If you like an elegant almost tiffany blue, then this is perfect! It looks so expensive! I've already received tons of compliments. People think I'm joking when I tell them I got it from Amazon. It looks like a high end specialty boutique piece.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Caruso

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height. Super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect. I wanted something comfy and femme for my office. The chair comes mostly assembled. All you have to do is attach the legs. It is the perfect height for my writing table/desk. From the floor to the top of my desk is about 31 inches and from the floor to the top of the seat cushion is about 16 inches. I like to sit low. I like to curl up with my feet in the seat and my computer in my lap. This chair was the perfect solution and alternative to a traditional office chair.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa J

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packing. Damaged. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: There is no packing in the (very large) box to protect the loveseat. The box was gouged in shipping, which meant that the loveseat was also gouged. It was pretty, otherwise. Stitching and other details weren't high end, but neither was the price. Just know that your couch will not be protected in shipping, and there's a good chance you'll have to go through the hassle of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo cute!
customer_reviews.text: This chair came 3 days early in a large box at my front door. It was incredibly easy to assemble; you only have to screw on the legs, no tools necessary. It’s a lot more light-weight than I expected; but it’s absolutely adorable and quite comfortable. The material is sturdy and it’s worth the money I spent. It goes perfectly with my reading nook within my beach themed apartment! 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Heckert

customer_reviews.title: Nice little seat (loveseat) has held together well but dont know how well it would do with everyday use. Light as a feather
customer_reviews.text: Well as you can see I originally bought for my livingroom but as you can see my grandaughter likes sleeping on it. It's really cute & so light I can carry it by myself. I do have to say its more like an oversized chair then a Loveseat!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: I really like this couch but I'm not too sure how long ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this couch but I'm not too sure how long it will last. Only had it a month and the cusions are already going flat. I do use it quite a lot so hopefully it isn't a decorative piece.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Neeley

customer_reviews.title: An extra touch of elegance
customer_reviews.text: This loveseat is so adorable and comfy!! The color is true ivory and it has a creamy look thanks to the nice quality of velvet. I was reluctant to buy off white furniture due to stain potential but this is worth it! It adds an extra touch of elegance to my living room. I had to interact with customer service over a shipping issue and they were beyond helpful! If only all sellers were this pleasant and customer oriented. They honestly wanted me to be happy with my purchase and that goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Scala

customer_reviews.title: a good accent chair
customer_reviews.text: First of all, loved the look of this chair. There are some cons but they aren’t so harsh as to discourage buying. Just some things to consider. The color was a bit dimmer than I expected...I guess it’s accurate to the product image, (I got the sea blue color) just make sure youre putting it in a brighter room because it can tend to look pretty dark. Pillows are a must. Honestly not super comfortable in general. Without pillows the back of the chair dips in too much. With pillows you don’t have a huge amount of sitting room. Cons aside, it looks super cute! I’m satisfied, it works with our room.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Reed

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my new space following a down size. Love the vibrant blue. The fabric is soft. It is light weight, so it does slide around a bit. Time will tell how well the seat cushion holds up. I added round walnut legs rather than using the squared black legs that came with the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: KP Williams

customer_reviews.title: True to photo and most reviews
customer_reviews.text: 4 because the material, like my skin, pulls/loses elasticity over time ;) And one of the legs was very difficult to get in to the frame. Color is great. Chair is really nice looking for the price. Saw questions about weight limit - someone 250 plus and about 6ft sat in it and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cori B. Ferman

customer_reviews.title: Cute and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but significantly smaller that I thought it would be. But ended up being perfect size for my office instead of my living room. Granted I didn’t check and measure out the dimensions to see how big it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Liisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small space at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: The legs are a bit thin for support and it's not plush, but I only paid $260 for this so it's worth the money. It's great in a small space. There's room for decorative throw pillows too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's just what I wanted! Perfect size for my room
customer_reviews.text: One of the bedrooms in our house became my small office and it's not a very big room but I wanted a couch in there and this fit perfectly. It's big enough to sit two people, and it's well-made. The box it came in was a bit beat up so I was afraid the couch would be too but it was in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: kgall

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy! I swapped out the legs for gold metal legs and it really made these chairs look high dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Butterbrodt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality.  Very cute littel sofa
customer_reviews.text: Cute little sofa. Material is nice. I love it. Fits perfectly in the small corner of the bedroom. I would recommend. It's nice that it's very light, as well. Easy to carry up stairs.
customer_reviews.author: ameliabedeliey

customer_reviews.title: Royal blue, not navy
customer_reviews.text: Great little loveseat. Works great in our bedroom with our TV set up. Both my husband and I can sit on it comfortably. Only complaint is the color is closer to royal blue than navy.
customer_reviews.author: Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: perfect for pre teen girls
customer_reviews.text: cute and very small, perfect for pre teen girls bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Shirley C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece but on the Small Side
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the color although it is slightly darker than the picture online. It truly is a beautiful piece of furniture and seems to be well made. Be warned, it is kind of low- I measured 16 inches from the floor to the top of the seat cushion - but it’s perfect for me as I’m only 5’3. Oh and my cat approves. (Pretty sure it has something to do with the super soft velvet upholstery :D )
customer_reviews.author: Candice Lee

customer_reviews.title: so cute.
customer_reviews.text: Love this, perfect mini-couch for bedroom. Seems quite sturdy and is very soft and very cute. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: pixiepout

customer_reviews.title: Love this loveseat!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this loveseat for my master bedroom. It is well made and looks great in my room. The first box received said a loveseat but wasn't at all - it was a sofa table. Returned for free and the correct item came very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: OAY

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chair
customer_reviews.text: My first time purchasing furniture through amazon. Was very impressed, exactly as described, and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Crystilyn Kane

customer_reviews.title: I must of got a good one...?
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the poor reviews. I ordered this and it arrived perfect. No loose fabric and it gets sit on daily in the recording studio.
customer_reviews.author: producerjay

customer_reviews.title: The chair is rich in quality and plush
customer_reviews.text: Plush. Comfy easy to assemble. Great quality. Well Worth the price I would recommend to any one. Looks like I spent 3x more then I did
customer_reviews.author: frances magno

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! So soft! Yes it's small, but perfect for me and tiny apartment. The color is darker that pictured, it's more of a peacock blue.
customer_reviews.author: dizzymittens

customer_reviews.title: Cute as decorative piece
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected and not comfortable. It is exactly as shown and cute for just decorative piece. Arrived on time and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plain and simple
customer_reviews.text: The loveseat is fine. It is definitely ivory and not white, which is what I wanted. I really wish it was white. You only have to screw in the legs and you’re good to go. It’s not heavy at all. It works well in the small space I have designated in my bedroom as my sitting area. It’s plain so I spruced it up with pillows.
customer_reviews.author: W. T.

customer_reviews.title: NOT a loveseat, but a chair
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to this for our office, but sadly, it resembles a chair and not the size of a normal loveseat. It is very light weight. This will be able to sit two people.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dunat

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My roommate and I were looking for stylish but affordable chairs for our room, and this chair works great for us! It’s SUPER easy to assemble and really light. It’s not the most comfortable chair I’ve ever sat in, but it is cute and great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Quality, durable and comfy. It works for decoration in my room and also I’ve pulled in into my home office since I threw away my old office chair. Love the fabric!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawnte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Everything I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This couch is a statement piece in my little She Shed. It’s so comfy and so appealing to the eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it fits perfectly in my office. I am disappointed that one of the legs were damaged. Modway customer service is sending a new part soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered black but it looks blue to me
customer_reviews.text: Nice chairs but to me they look blue not Black
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really made well
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this its not made really to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Mo25

customer_reviews.title: Legs missing!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without the legs to attach! Will contact Amazon to see if they can send them. Beautiful chair, hate to return it but don't wamt to sit on the ground!
customer_reviews.author: Naenae

customer_reviews.title: Just what I hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Stole someone else’s super cute idea to put the couch in front of my queen sized bed. I needed a cute little couch for my little studio apartment. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this was very small and uncomfortable. Not relaxing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice. Comfortable and look very classy. Such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Legs seem to be a little uneven but I am putting it on top of a thick rug so it doesn't really matter. Comfy and big enough to curl up in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Really prettycouch!! Very small! So beware!! Do the measurements before purchasing!!! Doesn’t match most chairs if you wanted a set... definitely not for men! Ideal for kids or petite women.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but small -more like a big chair or a Timi loveseat -good for price
customer_reviews.author: Jen PA-C

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible piece of furniture. Poor back support, light weight but not very sturdy, and priced higher than it should be. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph sayle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful I'm so happy with it I totally recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: I’m satisfied with my item!
customer_reviews.text: I love my loveseat! I have it my living room along with my sectional! My colors are ivory and teal blue theme colors!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! More comfortable then I thought and super velvety!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: It is on the small side, but it’s perfect for my space. Love the blue color. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not arrive with any of the legs for the loveseat. It is currently sitting on the floor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Loved it only had to put on legs no other assembly
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn Greaser

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It is a small love seat which ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is a small love seat which is just what I was looking for . The navy blue fabric is beautiful. Love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Angela D Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Super tiny, it looks like furniture for a kids ...
customer_reviews.text: Super tiny, it looks like furniture for a kids play room. When I sit down on it I feel the legs wobble. I bought it for looks in a rarely used room, but it’s so small it’s almost embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: monkeemommie

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with my loveseat
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my loveseat. I ordered the grey velvet-- it is incredibly soft! It fits perfectly in my small studio apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on the side shows but cute, soft and comfy
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bjorlin

product_meta.title: Modway Prospect Upholstered Velvet Contemporary Modern Accent Arm Chair in Sea Blue
product_meta.description: Color:Sea Blue| Size:Armchair| Style Name:Button TuftedIntrinsically luxurious, Prospect is a throwback to the classic Chesterfield design, while delivering an engaging modern look filled with passion and drive. Button tufting and sweeping curves blend to form a contemporary lounge piece that all will be drawn to. This cozy armchair with espresso stained wood legs and non-marking foot caps features comfortable foam padding and a soft velvety polyester lining.
feature_bullets: CONTEMPORARY STYLE - Boasting a tailored profile and chic style, Prospect embodies luxurious intrigue and sophistication. Prospect reinvents the iconic chesterfield style with contemporary allure

FINE UPHOLSTERY - Upholstered in stain-resistant perfomrance velvet Prospect's inset buttons create a diamond-tufted design. Energizing décors, this collection is ideal for small spaces or loft living
MODERN LOUNGE SPOT - A cherished round back upholstered armchair for any modern lounge space, Prospect provides a comfortable place to rest while relaxing or reading a bedtime story in the kid’s room
SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION - Expertly crafted, Prospect sits atop sturdy wood legs with non-marking caps. Sweeping curves and structured detail make Prospect a worthy focal point in the modern home
TUFTED LOVESEAT MEASUREMENTS - Redefining any living space, Prospect makes a striking statement brimming with possibility. Product Dimensions: 28.5"L x 49"W x 29.5"H; Maximum Weight Capacity: 285 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars150 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: One year warranty against manufacturer defects.
